name: GreedyUFO
description:
Greedy UFO is created during the BlackThornProd Game Jam 3 - theme was "less is more".

Greedy UFO attempts to fit into the theme by applying 2 downgrades and 3 upgrades to the UFO (where the former is less and the latter is more) every time a powerup is picked up.

The game objective is to get 10 powerups to proceed to the next round, where it gets harder and harder as enemy spawn rate and movement speed increases.

UFO stats affected by power ups:

UFO size - UFO movement speed - projectile travel speed - projectile firing rate - projectile size 

P.S. my highest run was round 30 ;)

P.P.S. it was my brother :'(

BGM - AShamaluevMusic
